code: "use strict";import Easing from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Easing";export const TransitionIOSSpec={animation:'spring',config:{stiffness:1000,damping:500,mass:3,overshootClamping:true,restDisplacementThreshold:10,restSpeedThreshold:10}};export const FadeInFromBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:350,easing:Easing.out(Easing.poly(5))}};export const FadeOutToBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:150,easing:Easing.in(Easing.linear)}};export const RevealFromBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:425,easing:Easing.bezier(0.20833,0.82,0.25,1)}};export const ScaleFromCenterAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:400,easing:Easing.bezier(0.20833,0.82,0.25,1)}};export const FadeInFromRightAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:450,easing:Easing.bezier(0.20833,0.82,0.25,1)}};export const FadeOutToLeftAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:450,easing:Easing.bezier(0.20833,0.82,0.25,1)}};export const BottomSheetSlideInSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:250,easing:t=>Math.cos((t+1)*Math.PI)/2.0+0.5}};export const BottomSheetSlideOutSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:200,easing:t=>t===1.0?1:Math.pow(t,2)}};
